{"id":287733377,"lang":"cpp","time":"1 year, 9 months","timestamp":1577011554,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"120 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/287733377/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Valid Palindrome II","memory":"34.9 MB","code":"bool isPalindrome(const string& s) {\n    size_t sz = s.size();\n    for(size_t i = 0; i < sz / 2; ++i) if (s[i] != s[sz - i - 1]) return false;\n    return true;\n}\n\nclass Solution {\npublic:\n    bool validPalindrome(string s) {\n        size_t sz = s.size();\n        for(size_t i = 0; i < sz / 2; ++i) if (s[i] != s[sz - i - 1]) {\n            string temp1 = s.substr(0, i).append(s.substr(i + 1, sz));\n            if(isPalindrome(temp1)) return true;\n\n            string temp2 = s.substr(0, sz - i - 1).append(s.substr(sz - i, sz));\n            if(isPalindrome(temp2)) return true;\n\n            return false;\n        }\n        return true;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"valid-palindrome-ii"}
